data.name: Modesto-Berkeley DevFest 2019
data.description: Hey GDGers, we know October is a long ways out, but we’re super excited to bring you the first DevFest to be hosted in Modesto (and our second partnering with GDG Berkeley)! Location is TBD, but the date will be October 19, 2019 so mark your calendars now and get ready for a day full of awesome tech…

relatedRecords.name: Into The Box 2020
relatedRecords.description: Into the Box is a yearly web technologies and software craftsmanship conference. We welcome you this May 1st to the 3rd, 2019 in Houston, Texas!

relatedRecords.name: SharePoint Saturday New York City 2020
relatedRecords.description: Administrators, end-users, architects, developers, and other professionals that work with Microsoft Collaboration or Cloud Technologies will meet to share the latest information for working with SharePoint, Microsoft365, the Power Platform and related offerings from Microsoft.
